<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// This class represents the number of cycles per resource (fractions of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="46"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cycles).  That quantity is managed here as a ratio, and accessed via the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// double cast-operator below.  The two quantities, number of cycles and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// number of resources, are kept separate.  This is used by the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="49"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ResourcePressureView to calculate the average resource cycles</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// per instruction/iteration.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles/#a9ce9e2b99d0fe80c3e6a18768e69576b">ReleaseAtCycles</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles/#a9ce9e2b99d0fe80c3e6a18768e69576b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles/#a9ce9e2b99d0fe80c3e6a18768e69576b">ReleaseAtCycles</a>() : Numerator(0), Denominator(1) &#123;&#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="59" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles/#a26ff889f8e47ac769849415c0d3e3140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">operator</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> double()</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="66"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Add the components of RHS to this instance.  Instead of calculating</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the final value here, we keep track of the numerator and denominator</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// separately, to reduce floating point error.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles">ReleaseAtCycles</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles/#a1d1222a8af6b87fac4929e328e141eeb">operator+=</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mca/releaseatcycles">ReleaseAtCycles</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86partialreduction-cpp/#a87b8bfbbe9d8f7146d7f20a5fb42efd0">RHS</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Populates vector Masks with processor resource masks.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The number of bits set in a mask depends on the processor resource type.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Each processor resource mask has at least one bit set. For groups, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// number of bits set in the mask is equal to the cardinality of the group plus</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// one. Excluding the most significant bit, the remaining bits in the mask</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// identify processor resources that are part of the group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Example:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  ResourceA  -- Mask: 0b001</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  ResourceB  -- Mask: 0b010</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  ResourceAB -- Mask: 0b100 U (ResourceA::Mask | ResourceB::Mask) == 0b111</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ResourceAB is a processor resource group containing ResourceA and ResourceB.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Each resource mask uniquely identifies a resource; both ResourceA and</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ResourceB only have one bit set.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ResourceAB is a group; excluding the most significant bit in the mask, the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// remaining bits identify the composition of the group.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Resource masks are used by the ResourceManager to solve set membership</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// problems with simple bit manipulation operations.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">void</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae1d3c5a1f43dcec43774a3767b41e447">computeProcResourceMasks</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedmodel">MCSchedModel</a> &amp;SM,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">                              <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mutablearrayref">MutableArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> Masks);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Returns the index of the highest bit set. For resource masks, the position of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the highest bit set can be used to construct a resource mask identifier.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#ae652ac0aafced9e7ef6249d3b4e50171">getResourceStateIndex</a>(uint64&#95;t Mask) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Mask &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Processor Resource Mask cannot be zero!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">llvm::Log2&#95;64</a>(Mask);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// Compute the reciprocal block throughput from a set of processor resource</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// cycles. The reciprocal block throughput is computed as the MAX between:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - NumMicroOps / DispatchWidth</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">///  - ProcReleaseAtCycles / #ProcResourceUnits  (for every consumed resource).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">double</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/mca/#a0a98238e0b4ad204e6bf241ab4cefe47">computeBlockRThroughput</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/mcschedmodel">MCSchedModel</a> &amp;SM, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> DispatchWidth,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> NumMicroOps,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">                               <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;unsigned&gt;</a> ProcResourceUsage);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace mca</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// namespace llvm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlightPreprocessor">#endif </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// LLVM&#95;MCA&#95;SUPPORT&#95;H</span></CodeLine>

</ProgramListing>
